Getting Started.description: A collection of simple introductory topics for learning coding

files.Hello World: My First Program. Show the words Hello World on the screen
files.Calculate Area Of A Circle: Calculate the area of a circle using well known formula
files.Print Multiplication Table: Print tables of any huge number

files.Blink: Blink all LEDs on PORTB every 2 seconds
files.Blink LEDs alternately: Flash PB0 to  PB3 , then flash PB4 to PB7. repeat ad nauseum

Explore Atmega32.description: More detailed introduction to the KuttyPy microcontroller ...

files.Read N Voltages: Read and display some ADC readings
files.PORTB LED WATERFALL: Dancing LEDs on PORTB (PB0 to PB7)
files.Read ADC Registers: ReadADC values frmo the kuttypy hardware
files.Copy INPUT A2-A7 to LED D2-D7: Use switches to turn LEDs ON/OFF
files.setport: Set the Value on a port

WiFi and Games.description: Add games such as birdy, pianos, and control them with sensors of your phone   ...

files.Bird Game with Light Sensor: The brighter the surroundings, the higher the bird flies. Take your phone near a light source to try
files.Play Song Using Functions: Write a function to play songs
files.Rotation Controlled Bird: Control a game bird by rotating your phone
files.AI Bird Game.xml: Control the bird with your fingers in air. no touching.

Sensor Addons.description: Sensors which work with the KuttyPy hardware

files.Data Logger: Plot data from sensors. Click on SCAN to automatically detect the sensor. Then execute the program
files.Measure Heart Rate (MAX30100): Use a MAX30100 sensor to see your heartbeat
files.Distance Sensor VL53L0X: Use a distance sensor to measure height and plot the values
files.Phone Controlled Robot: Control a robot with your phone by rotating it around. uses the accelerometer and gyro sensors in the phone

Vision Demos.description: Gesture controlled programs using AI based image and pattern recognition

files.AI Gesture LEDs: Control LED patterns with your hand in the air
files.AI Piano: Play the piano without touching anything. hold up your hand, and fold fingers to play music
files.AI birdy: Control a game bird's movement by changing the distance between your thumb and index finger (pinching motion)
files.AI Hand Gestures: Plot the distance from the tip of your thumb to the tip of your index finger
files.AI LED.xml: Turn an LED on/off using just your finger in air. no touching. :)

Plotting Datasets.description: Learn about graphs. Plot X vs Time, X vs Y , arrays etc..

Internet Of Things.description: Send and receive sensor data over the internet
